title: About Us
intro: LiftFitter is an international team of elevator specialists delivering comprehensive solutions across Europe. We handle the complete lifecycle of elevator and escalator equipment — from installation and modernization to servicing and dismantling.
turnkey: We provide turnkey solutions, managing every detail from initial documentation and logistics to final commissioning and handover.

reach.title: Our reach
reach.description: Operating across Poland, Germany, Spain, Denmark, the Netherlands, and beyond, we partner with leading manufacturers including Kleemann, Schindler, KONE, Orona, and BKG, as well as trusted local brands.

delivery.title: On-time delivery
delivery.description: We complete every project according to schedule, minimizing downtime for your building.

experience.title: Experienced teams
experience.description: Our certified technicians bring years of hands-on expertise to every installation.

transparency.title: Full transparency
transparency.description: Detailed documentation at every stage keeps you informed and compliant.

safety.title: Safety first
safety.description: All work adheres to EN81 standards and local health & safety regulations, including UDT compliance.

tailored.title: Tailored solutions
tailored.description: We adapt our approach to meet your specific requirements and budget.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: To deliver safe, reliable, and durable elevator solutions through professional installation and service excellence — keeping people moving safely, every day.
